annonstext:
UCG/Radio Support is a consulting company based in Kista in northern Stockholm. Regardless placement you will be employed by UCG, with Swedish salary and benefits.

The Consultant role

As a consultant you may be placed at different customers. UCG will assist with extra training when needed. As a consultant we need you to be flexible and to easily adapt to a new environment.

Education/training

Our roles requires a basic technical education, sometimes university level.

Experience

We require at least 3 years of relevant job experience for all roles, mostly more.

Required experience for this role:

• software development in various programming languages, particularly Python and Java

• Knowledge and interest in cloud technologies and tools, container/microservices and computer networks

• Interest and preferably experience of testing systems under high load and with many sessions.

• Customer focus and ambition to understand customer needs on developed features

MSc/BSc level in Computer Science or the equivalent level of knowledge

Working language: English

Meriting competence

• Have been working with IP-networks

• Previous experience in cloud native container environment

About the position

• work as a software developer with focus on system testing with agile teams within High Availability.

 • Be a part of multi-functional, self-organizing and highly independent team

• Work with automation and development of System Tests for features of 5G.

• You will work to understand the whole product and its environment

• You will be learning and sharing information with team members

Location: Gothenburg

Start: Asap
